name: Compassion
description: We approach our work with empathy and understanding, recognizing the dignity of those we serve and the importance of human connection.

name: Service
description: We are committed to serving others and making a positive impact in our community through direct action and meaningful engagement.

name: Innovation
description: We embrace creative thinking and new approaches to addressing social challenges, always seeking better ways to serve.

name: Collaboration
description: We believe in the power of working together, building partnerships, and uniting diverse perspectives to achieve common goals.

name: Integrity
description: We operate with transparency, honesty, and accountability in all our actions and decisions, earning trust through ethical conduct.

name: Growth
description: We foster personal and collective development, learning from our experiences and continuously improving our impact.
